languages.text: "Не буду испытывать нашу дружбу, эттфатер. Знаю, что если призову тебя с собой на поиски своей стаи, то оторву от важных сражений и спасения своего дома. Потому отправлюсь искать братьев один. Но и тебя в трудный час не брошу — я тебе должен. Как повергнем твоих врагов, оставлю тебя и направлюсь по следу".

"I will not test our friendship, Aett-Vater. I know that if I call upon you to go with me in search of my pack, I will be taking you away from important battles and the saving of your home. So I will go alone to seek my brothers. But I will not abandon you in your hour of need — I owe you. When we have defeated your enemies, I will leave you and follow the trail."
languages.original_text: "Не буду испытывать нашу дружбу, эттфатер. Знаю, что если призову тебя с собой на поиски своей стаи, то оторву от важных сражений и спасения своего дома. Потому отправлюсь искать братьев один. Но и тебя в трудный час не брошу — я тебе должен. Как повергнем твоих врагов, оставлю тебя и направлюсь по следу".

I know that if I call upon you to go with me in search of my pack, I will be taking you away from important battles and the saving of your home. So I will go alone to seek my brothers. But I will not abandon you in your hour of need — I owe you. When we have defeated your enemies, I will leave you and follow the trail."

So I will go alone to seek my brothers. But I will not abandon you in your hour of need — I owe you. When we have defeated your enemies, I will leave you and follow the trail."

So I will go alone to seek my brothers. But I will not abandon you in your hour of need — I owe you. When we have defeated your enemies, I will leave you and follow the trail."

languages.text: “我不打算考验你我之间的友谊，狼领。我明白，若是我要你与我一起去寻找我的狼群，就相当于在逼迫你离开这场重要的战斗，要你放弃拯救家园的目标。因此，我打算自己去找我的狼群。不过，你还需要我的帮助，我不打算丢下你不管。我欠你的人情，等打败你的敌人之后，我再离开你身边，寻找狼群的足迹。”
languages.original_text: "I will not test our friendship, Aett-Vater. I know that if I call upon you to go with me in search of my pack, I will be taking you away from important battles and the saving of your home. So I will go alone to seek my brothers. But I will not abandon you in your hour of need — I owe you. When we have defeated your enemies, I will leave you and follow the trail."

traits.locale_text: “我不打算考验你我之间的友谊，狼领。我明白，若是我要你与我一起去寻找我的狼群，就相当于在逼迫你离开这场重要的战斗，要你放弃拯救家园的目标。因此，我打算自己去找我的狼群。不过，你还需要我的帮助，我不打算丢下你不管。我欠你的人情，等打败你的敌人之后，我再离开你身边，寻找狼群的足迹。”

languages.text: 「俺らの友情を試すつもりはない、アエット＝ヴァテル。俺の群れを一緒に探してくれと頼むことで、重要な戦闘とフォン・ヴァランシウス家の救援からお前という戦力を削ぐというのは承知している。だから、同胞を探しに行くのは俺一人でいい。だが、お前が助けを必要とするときに見捨てるつもりはない…借りがあるからな。お前の敵を打ち倒したら俺は同胞を追跡する、そのときは別れよう」
languages.original_text: "I will not test our friendship, Aett-Vater. I know that if I call upon you to go with me in search of my pack, I will be taking you away from important battles and the saving of your home. So I will go alone to seek my brothers. But I will not abandon you in your hour of need — I owe you. When we have defeated your enemies, I will leave you and follow the trail."

traits.locale_text: 「俺らの友情を試すつもりはない、アエット＝ヴァテル。俺の群れを一緒に探してくれと頼むことで、重要な戦闘とフォン・ヴァランシウス家の救援からお前という戦力を削ぐというのは承知している。だから、同胞を探しに行くのは俺一人でいい。だが、お前が助けを必要とするときに見捨てるつもりはない…借りがあるからな。お前の敵を打ち倒したら俺は同胞を追跡する、そのときは別れよう」

languages.text: «No dejaré en la estacada nuestra amistad, Aett-Vater. Sé que, si le pido que me ayude a buscar a mi manada, le estaría apartando de contiendas más importantes y la salvación de su propio hogar. Por ello daré con mis hermanos por mi cuenta. Dicho esto, no l{mf|o|a} abandonaré cuando lo necesite; se lo debo. Cuando hayamos derrotado a sus enemigos, tomaré senda propia y seguiré el rastro».
languages.original_text: "I will not test our friendship, Aett-Vater. I know that if I call upon you to go with me in search of my pack, I will be taking you away from important battles and the saving of your home. So I will go alone to seek my brothers. But I will not abandon you in your hour of need — I owe you. When we have defeated your enemies, I will leave you and follow the trail."

traits.locale_text: «No dejaré en la estacada nuestra amistad, Aett-Vater. Sé que, si le pido que me ayude a buscar a mi manada, le estaría apartando de contiendas más importantes y la salvación de su propio hogar. Por ello daré con mis hermanos por mi cuenta. Dicho esto, no l{mf|o|a} abandonaré cuando lo necesite; se lo debo. Cuando hayamos derrotado a sus enemigos, tomaré senda propia y seguiré el rastro».

languages.text: « Je ne souhaite pas mettre en péril notre amitié, aett-vater. Je vous détournerais d'importants combats et de la défense de votre foyer en vous demandant de partir avec moi à la recherche de ma meute. C'est à moi seul qu'incombe de retrouver mes frères. Mais j'ai une dette envers vous et je ne vous abandonnerai pas au moment où vous avez besoin de moi. Je vous quitterai pour suivre la piste lorsque nous aurons triomphé de vos ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "I will not test our friendship, Aett-Vater. I know that if I call upon you to go with me in search of my pack, I will be taking you away from important battles and the saving of your home. So I will go alone to seek my brothers. But I will not abandon you in your hour of need — I owe you. When we have defeated your enemies, I will leave you and follow the trail."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne souhaite pas mettre en péril notre amitié, aett-vater. Je vous détournerais d'importants combats et de la défense de votre foyer en vous demandant de partir avec moi à la recherche de ma meute. C'est à moi seul qu'incombe de retrouver mes frères. Mais j'ai une dette envers vous et je ne vous abandonnerai pas au moment où vous avez besoin de moi. Je vous quitterai pour suivre la piste lorsque nous aurons triomphé de vos ennemis. »

languages.text: "Ich werde unsere Freundschaft nicht auf die Probe stellen, Aett-Vater. Ich weiß, wenn ich Euch bitte, zusammen mit mir mein Rudel zu suchen, halte ich Euch von wichtigen Schlachten und der Rettung Eurer Heimat ab. Also werde ich alleine auf die Suche nach meinen Brüdern gehen. Aber ich werde Euch in der Stunde der Not nicht im Stich lassen – ich stehe in Eurer Schuld. Wenn wir Eure Feinde besiegt haben, verlasse ich Euch und folge der Spur."
languages.original_text: "I will not test our friendship, Aett-Vater. I know that if I call upon you to go with me in search of my pack, I will be taking you away from important battles and the saving of your home. So I will go alone to seek my brothers. But I will not abandon you in your hour of need — I owe you. When we have defeated your enemies, I will leave you and follow the trail."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde unsere Freundschaft nicht auf die Probe stellen, Aett-Vater. Ich weiß, wenn ich Euch bitte, zusammen mit mir mein Rudel zu suchen, halte ich Euch von wichtigen Schlachten und der Rettung Eurer Heimat ab. Also werde ich alleine auf die Suche nach meinen Brüdern gehen. Aber ich werde Euch in der Stunde der Not nicht im Stich lassen – ich stehe in Eurer Schuld. Wenn wir Eure Feinde besiegt haben, verlasse ich Euch und folge der Spur."

languages.text: "Dostluğumuzu test etmeyeceğim Aett-Vater. Sürümü aramak için benimle gelmeni istesem seni önemli savaşlardan ve yuvanı kurtarma görevinden alıkoyacağımı biliyorum. Kardeşlerimi tek başıma arayacağım. Fakat zor zamanında seni terk etmeyeceğim, sana borçluyum. Senin düşmanlarını yendiğimizde yanından ayrılıp izlerini takip edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I will not test our friendship, Aett-Vater. I know that if I call upon you to go with me in search of my pack, I will be taking you away from important battles and the saving of your home. So I will go alone to seek my brothers. But I will not abandon you in your hour of need — I owe you. When we have defeated your enemies, I will leave you and follow the trail."
